availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Miriam Davis. Father of Christian C. Davis, Francis V. Davis, Marietta Davis, Louisa Ann Davis, Henson Davis, Chilton Davis, John R. Davis, and Winfield S. Davis. Farmer in Boyd County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, p. 21.
Find A Grave, "Aaron Davis (January 1, 1816-October 5, 1882)," Memorial #88123520, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/88123520 (accessed April 9, 2018).
